Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Our impact in Vermont and across the country is growing, which is why I’m excited to share our 2018 Annual Report with you.

It was a big year for us here at the ACLU of Vermont, thanks to supporters like you.

Inside the report, you’ll get a snapshot of how we’ve advanced Vermonters’ civil liberties this past year, including winning a historic ruling for racial justice in the Vermont Supreme Court, standing up for the rights of immigrants in Vermont, and working to safeguard Vermonters’ reproductive autonomy.

We also mark year one of our Smart Justice Vermont campaign, which aims to reduce Vermont’s prison population but investing in fairer, smarter alternatives to incarceration.

Thank you for all you do to support the ACLU in the Green Mountain State and across the country. Please continue to support our work. We could not do this without you.

Thanks for sticking with us,
